sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: On a visit to Lisbon to celebrate World Youth Day, Pope Francis said the victims of clerical child sex abuse must be listened to.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's the day of reckoning for former US President Donald Trump as he faces charges of election conspiracy in Washington, D.C.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Storms in Taiwan, floods in China and scorching temperatures in South Korea. Extreme weather events in Asia are devastating lives and communities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis has met survivors of clerical sexual abuse carried out in

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Portugal and blasted the country's Catholic hierarchy for its response.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Francis addressed the scandal on the first day of a five-day visit to Lisbon for the Catholic Church's World Youth Day festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is often accentuated by the disappointment or anger that some people feed on in relation to the Church. a la Iglesia, en algunos casos por nuestro mal testimonio y por los escándalos que han desfigurado su rostro y que llaman a una purificación humilde y constante, partiendo del grito de dolor de las víctimas que siempre han de ser acogidas y escuchadas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Después de su adresa y fuera de las cámaras, Francis spoke to 13 abuse victims for more than an hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The Pope's visit comes after a panel of experts hired by Portugal's bishops reported in February that priests and other church personnel may have abused thousands of boys and girls since 1950.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: After the document's release, the bishops initially refused to remove named abusers from their posts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This is Francis' fourth World Youth Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The festival was launched by Pope John Paul II in the 1980s to invigorate the church's younger members.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump is preparing for his court hearing in Washington, D.C. today, where he will formally be charged for trying to overturn the 2020 election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Security is being ramped up outside the court, although he may have the option to attend virtually.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Trump faces four counts, including conspiracy to defraud the U.S., tampering with a witness and conspiracy against the rights of citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While these are historic in the sense it's the first for a president to be indicted with spreading lies, it's only one of three cases against him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In other proceedings, Trump is being charged with mishandling classified files and falsifying business records to cover up a hush money payment to an adult film star.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And prosecutors in Georgia may bring a fourth criminal case forward.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Over allegations Trump tried to subvert the 2020 election result there.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: These legal troubles come as Trump campaigns to return to the White House. He is currently the clear frontrunner in the Republican Party's contest to pick its next presidential candidate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And latest opinion polls have him and current President Joe Biden level at 43%.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: From violent storms to unrelenting heat, Asia is experiencing a summer of extreme weather.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Taiwan is bracing for the arrival of Typhoon Canaan, which was predicted to bring heavy rains and winds of more than 160 kilometers per hour.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It has already lashed Japan's southern islands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: China is also reeling from the effects of Typhoon Doksun, which has caused deaths and devastation across the Beijing region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 21 people have been killed in widespread flooding following the heaviest rains in the area in 140 years.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In South Korea, soaring temperatures are posing a different kind of threat.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 100 people have been treated for heat-related illnesses at the World Scout Jamboree.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The mercury is set to remain in the mid-30s in the coming days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Around the world, climate records are being broken by what experts say is a combination of global warming and the El Niño weather phenomenon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Battling the August heat, Tehran has declared a two-day holiday for government workers and banks nationwide as searing temperatures sweep across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The decision came after the National Weather Office forecast highs exceeding 40 degrees Celsius in many cities and temperatures are hovering around 50 degrees in the southwest.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The health ministry has warned residents not to overexpose themselves to the sun for fear of heatstroke and has urged people to stay indoors between 10 a.m. and 4 p.m.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Inadequate storage and treatment along with illegal waste loads have become literally a burning problem in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Many of the German authorities do not feel like taking the waste away, so we wanted to solve this issue by the way of the court, but it did not work. Therefore, according to the law, every member state of the European Union has the right to file a complaint with the European Commission for other countries. We did it here. The European Commission has three months to analyze and answer this matter." Christopher Stolzenberg from the German Ministry for the Environment has commented, saying returning illegal shipments is the responsibility of the federal states. He added, however, that the fact that illegal waste shipments from Germany are taking place is of great concern to them and that the ministry remains committed to improving the prevention of illegal waste shipments in the EU.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A police raid in a Rio de Janeiro favela set off a gun battle Wednesday that killed

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: nine people and wounded two officers. It marks the latest incident in a wave of lethal policing in Brazil. A crackdown on criminal gangs and drug traffickers have left dozens dead across three states. More than 50 people have now died. The clashes began last Friday when a police officer was shot dead while on patrol. Officers say they have seized seven rifles, ammunition and grenades from suspects so far.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Brazilian police have rescued four men who crossed the Atlantic from Nigeria, clinging to the rudder of a cargo ship.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The stowaways had hidden themselves in a tiny compartment above the vessel's steering mechanism before it set sail from Lagos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The ruling journey took 14 days, but the men's supply of food and water reportedly ran out after the 10th day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: They're said to have told Coast Guard officers they thought the ship was heading to Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Two of them have since returned to Nigeria, while the others have applied for asylum in Brazil. Take some water. I'll go get the life vest now.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
